name: Swan Feast Rhythm
description:
Swan Feast Rhythm is a short Rhythm game based on the The Feast at Swan Goose Gate, also known as the Banquet at Hongmen, Hongmen Banquet. The game narrates the story of a assasination attempt on Liu Bang, the Emperor Gaozu of Han,  by a sword dancer .

-May have to click multiple times for click to register.

Controls: Arrow Keys/WASD

This Game was made in 7 days for the Historically Accurate Game Jam

PeptoDisco - Programming  

maname - Art

Pauzonildes - UI/UX 

MijimoGO - Music
